definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: As a result, their spoken English might not improve.
sentences.chinese: 所以，他们的英语口语可能得不到提高。

sentences.english: He could not get a hare again; instead he was laughed at by the people of Song.
sentences.chinese: 兔子他再也得不到，他自己反倒被宋国人嘲笑了。

sentences.english: But in this area, it seems that no good idea goes unpunished.
sentences.chinese: 但是在这个地区，好提议却往往得不到认同。

sentences.english: And if customers do not get what they want, they defect.
sentences.chinese: 如果顾客得不到他们想要的服务，他们就会跑掉。

sentences.english: You may not get that job because your age is against you.
sentences.chinese: 你也学得不到那份工作，因为你的年龄对你不利。

sentences.english: Avocados have gotten a bad reputation as being high in fat.
sentences.chinese: 鳄梨由于脂肪含量高而得不到好的声誉。

sentences.english: They Covered Their Bodies With Bruises And Wounds, And Denied Them Food And Shelter.
sentences.chinese: 他们都被弄得遍体鳞伤，也得不到食物和住处。

sentences.english: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
sentences.chinese: 记住，有时候得不到自己想要的往往是一个大幸。

sentences.english: If I can’t have the real thing, I can make do with the imitation.
sentences.chinese: 如果我得不到真品，那也可以用仿制品对付一下。

sentences.english: Be happy. When you don't have what you want
sentences.chinese: 保持心情舒畅。如果你得不到你想要的

sentences.english: Thein Sein was not given much respect at home, either.
sentences.chinese: 吴登盛在国内也得不到多少尊重。

sentences.english: The dishonest, if they act honestly, get no credit.
sentences.chinese: 不老实的人，即使做了老实事，也得不到信任。

sentences.english: A berserker wizard gets no score for treasure.
sentences.chinese: 一个狂暴的巫术师得不到珍贵的记号。

sentences.english: For deaths not designated karoshi the family gets next to nothing.
sentences.chinese: 而不被认为是过劳死的死者家属几乎什么也得不到。

sentences.english: His inconsolable widow continued to keep the wine-shop.
sentences.chinese: 他的遗孀，得不到一点安慰，继续开着那店铺。

sentences.english: To not have any answers is torture.
sentences.chinese: 得不到任何其他的答案简直是一种折磨啊。

definition: variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
to be deficient in sth/to be short of sth (supplies, money etc)
